5_1M1c7x7SLau8D2bm8Gw8iWQbBqe9X4zqPw.body:
请教一个问题
or Browser设置好在地址栏打开about:preferences#advanced->设置->不使用代理->输入127.0.0.1:43110
启动 Tor Browser，连上tor网络之后
用zeronet.cmd快捷方式启动
ZeroBundle\zeronet.cmd --tor always --tor_proxy 127.0.0.1:9150 --tor_controller 127.0.0.1:9151
tor状态还是waiting
报错如下：
[13:11:42] - Creating UiServer....
[13:11:44] - Removing old SSL certs...
[13:11:44] - Starting servers....
[13:11:44] TorManager Downloading Tor...
[13:11:45] Ui.UiServer --------------------------------------
[13:11:45] Ui.UiServer Web interface: http://127.0.0.1:43110/
[13:11:45] Ui.UiServer --------------------------------------
[13:11:45] - Failed to modify max files open limit: No module named win32file
[13:11:46] FileServer Checking port 15441 using portchecker.co...
[13:11:47] TorManager Error starting Tor client: ProxyConnectionError: Error con
necting to SOCKS5 proxy 127.0.0.1:49050: [Errno 10061] 由于目标机器积极拒绝，无
法连接。 in TorManager.py line 74 > TorManager.py line 101 > helper.py line 130
> SocksProxy.py line 12 > socks.py line 674
[13:11:49] Site:1KHCBG..HSD4 Announce to 0 trackers in 1.219s, failed
[13:11:50] Site:1MaiL5..Ju27 Announce to 0 trackers in 0.906s, failed
[13:11:52] Site:16bQCo..q7AJ Announce to 0 trackers in 1.000s, failed
[13:11:54] Site:1NzWew..V3vS Announce to 0 trackers in 1.000s, failed

注：我在纯tor状态下设置是成功的，能always，代理端口是49050，我尝试过修改端口，发觉不能修改，否则就是waiting

报错贴的不完整，补：
